title: Death Skid Marks v1.03
description:
Death Skid Marks is a roguelike-like car combat game about what so many of us have experienced: a road trip to a music gigÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ only in this game, things get violent. The game uniquely blends top down arcade action and RPG mechanics. 

Death Skid Marks is an ultra-violent top-down car combat game where you will kill countless numbers of foes in the most noble quest of all: getting to a kickass music concert. Fight groupies, rednecks, neo-nazis, religious fanatics, the police, robots, aliens, suicide bombers and your own self-destructive urges to play Russian roulette. Upgrade your car with parts and your crew with illicit substances, buy weapons and special items, fight using guns, melee and your driving skills. Travel 666 kms along route 666 and face increasingly impossible odds. Unlock tons of content such as cars and bumper stickers.

Death Skid Marks features a unique punk/metal soundtrack, unique art style, cutting edge low-fidelity cathodic screen graphics, random unpredictable runs, unique gameplay and two scoops of stupidity.

Drive, kill, die and drive again.

Features:
- Trashy humor and art.
- Original metal/rock/punk soundtrack featuring 50 tracks.
- Frenetic top down hardcore car combat action.
- A full run that lasts around 1H30, replay often but die often.
- Completely random levels, infinite replay value.
- 30 achievements that all unlock new content.
- 32 vehicles to drive.
- Over 70 different items to buy.
- Gambling mini-games.
- 16 hitchhikers.
- 11 bosses and around 50 different enemy types (not counting variations).
- 14 different game modes.

v1.01-1.03 changelog:
[Contents]
- New Road Background.
- Add flac format for the soundtrack.
- Update the mp3 files at 320 kbps.
- Stereo options.
[Bugs fixed]
- Bumper Sticker: Lost money when you go back to the main menu.
- Shield Car: Drain money after the level is over (panels) and you pressed mouse button.
- Hiker duplicates (except for the horsemask "fallback").
- Ambulance/Truck lose their invincibility (rear part) after healing.
- Game won't start: Email us or use the "Bug reporting forum" if you still get this one.
